msbt.message: It's Turkey Day! I can't wait to try a little of this and a little of that Ooh! And a little of the other thing!Uh, my fans are counting on me for recommendations, . This is super-serious business!

OK, so today is going to be great practice for when I need to go on one of those cooking shows.I need to make the perfect face for every type of taste reaction. Ready? Here goesNummy? Check.<10_4 /> Icky? Check. <10_4 />Spicy? Check. I'm good at this!
Anyone who's not out here right now is probably back home, hard at work making a Turkey Day feastOoh, there's going to be so much good stuff to sample! I want to try EVERYTHING, .

Wait, Franklin is counting on you to deliver the ingredients he needs? You can NOT let him down!If you're having a hard time finding something, maybe try checking with folks cooking at home.You've got this, ! Let's make Turkey Day the absolute best!

I can't believe we're getting a celeb chef like Franklin to help us with Turkey Day, !I hope he can find everything he needs here on to make a totally yummy menu for us.Wait, you're helping him source ingredients? That's, like, ultra important. Good luck!My taste buds are counting on you
Ooh, everything looks DELISH so far I might have to take a few pics so I can daydream about it later!
Ooh, it smells soooo good out here! My tongue is totes jealous of my nose right now, !
Ohmigosh. All of the dishes look so good. How can I possibly choose, ? Ahhhh!
I was promised all kinds of delish food. Andit has fully been delivered! I am SO READY for this.

OK, keep this hush-hush, but I just snacked on the teensiest bit of . I knooooow it's Turkey Day and I should save my appetite, but I just couldn't wait!Don't even worry though. My tummy is totes ready to finish off all these dishes whenevs.
Ohmuhgahhhmmmffff izzz ommm GULP!Sorry! That bite was TOO enormz.
Umm, I think I've made up my mind. I'm going to be a professional food taster. This is all just TOO good!
I keep taking bite after bite, and each one is more delish than the last. How long can this continue?!
Ugh, I'm at a total loss! I want to hurry up and finish what I'm eating so I can try something newBut, like, I want to savor whatever I'm eating at any given moment to the max! Why meeeeee?!
We are so lucky to have all of this incredible food, . I just want to share it with everyone!
Let's seedo I go one, two, three, four? Four, three, two, one? One, four, three, two?Oh, don't mind me, . I'm just working out THE most optimal order to taste everything!
Doesn't the just, like, SPEAK to you in this ?I'm glad you were able to source that special ingredient for the chef. You're, like, my Turkey Day hero!
I hear you're the one who provided the for the today.That means you get part of the credit for that totally fab we all get to share!My taste buds will thank you with every bite, .
Don't the manila clams just, like, SPEAK to you in this ?I'm glad you were able to source that special ingredient for the chef. You're, like, my Turkey Day hero!
I hear you're the one who provided the manila clams for the today.That means you get part of the credit for that totally fab we all get to share!My taste buds will thank you with every bite, .
So, since it's Turkey Day, I'm making something from scratch for all of my adoring fans.
Welcooooome! I'm in cooking mode today because it's Turkey Day!
So I know that everyone on the island is waiting to see what I'm going to makeAnd I totes can't wait to share it, butthere are no shortcuts in cooking, !
I've already made a few things that turned out just OK, but do I seem like I'd be good with "just OK"?OF COURSE NOT! I'm going to keep right on cooking until I whip up something vlogworthy.
That said, I could really use right now.If a certain someone known as might happen to come across that ingredientA certain someone known as miiiight be open to a traaaaade.
Oh, unrelated, is that a hint of I smell?Sorry, it's just that I could totally USE some , and, wellIf you HAD some, I'm sure we could work out a trade. My pantry is, like, mega stocked, .
Sure!
Sorry, I can't...
Aww, that's OK. That was kinda out of the blue. And it's no setback for meI am the queen of substitutions!But, y'know, if you DO change your mind about sharing some of your precious I'm here for it!
You knowthis dish needs a little somethingand I think it might be a little !
Take this!
Sorry, can't help.
You know what would make this dish sing like, well, me? Some ! Want to trade?
Here, take this!
I can't help with that.
Whatever. I don't mean that sarcastically, by the way. But I get that, like, a lot.Anyway, let me know if you change your mind. I will give you a special ingredient in exchange, you know!
Oh, fine. I mean, I don't know how I'm ever going to get any of that, but really. Totes fine
Ohmigosh. You did NOT just tease me like that! I didn't know you had it in you, !
Oh, that's sosweet. But it's not exactly what I needed. I need some , remember?Don't worry. I'm still open to trading if you find some!
Wow, you are a major lifesaver, !I hope this helps you as much as you've helped me, .
Oh, and that's not all. I'm going to give you a hot cooking tip straight from . That's me!
OK, soeveryone knows you use manila clams in clam chowder, obvs. But adding a scallop is where it's at!I heard that from a celebrity chef, so you know it's totes legit.
So, like, you know how clam chowder is mainly just manila clams? Soooo boring. AnywayI bet you could spice it up with some other ingredient. Like some kind of meaty shellfish or something.
So, pumpkin pies. They're legit yummy, but you can go absolutely couture with different colors!If you use different colors of pumpkins, the pies you make will look AND taste more colorful!
So, obviously the star of a classic pumpkin pie is the pumpkin. Like, duh.But what if you used those mega- cute pumpkins that come in different colors? Mind blown, right?
Gratin is, like, the acoustic guitar of potato dishes. It's mellow, and it gets along with any ingredients.But when you add a rock star like Dungeness crab to the mix? It's like a dream collab, !

So, have you ever had gratin? Le boring, right? <10_4 />But have you tried it with crab? It's sooooo good!The volume! The creaminess! The total, like, crab factor! You have GOT to try it.The only problem is, I don't know what kind of crab the chef was using, .
Not that I'm, like, the world's best chef or anything, butI know my way around a fish meunière.And I am here to tell you that using barred knifejaw is THE way to go. For real! Give it a try, !
Yeah, you could just throw together some fish meunière with any old fish. But that's so BOOOORING!If you want a fish meunière that POPS, try using some kind of striped fish! You heard it from me.
I can't thank you enough! My dish was OFF THE CHARTS, and it's all partially thanks to you for sharing!
Eeee! My dish was a major hit, and I need to give you mega credit for sharing that spesh ingredient!
Soooo, umhow many test bites do you take when you're cooking? Is it, like, a lot?I just want to make sure my food tastes ultra fab, ! Even if it means most of it gets pre-eaten.
I learned so much about cooking during all of this. Ohmigosh! I should release a cookbook!Wait, waitI don't want to get ahead of myself. I should release a song about the cookbook first!
All of this cooking was SO much work, but it's really rewarding to feed folks, you know?Because, like, music makes you feel good, but you can't EAT it. Ooh! But what if you could?!
Sorry, I'm all over the place. It's Turkey Day, and I really need to focus on cooking, !
It's Turkey Day! I'm totes hyped! This is like the stadium show of holidays, !
I know everyone is counting on me to fully BUH-RING IT for Turkey Day.And I can't let my fans down, . Time to get to work cooking mega noms for everyone!
I feel like I learned SO MUCH about cooking today, and it was so fun and lively in the plaza!I know we can't have Turkey Day every day, but Wait, why CAN'T we do that, ?
Awww, the whole Turkey Day event happened so fast. We need an encore, !There was so much food and so much funI feel like I just finished a world tour. But I totes want more!

So how was your Turkey Day?<10_4 /> Mine was fab! I had so much fun cooking and sampling food in the plaza.And that chef is, like, a superstar, if you ask me. I absolutely NEED him to release a full tasting menu.

Soooo if I were a diva giving feedback about the food today I'd say it was perfect-a-mundo!Everything was super good. But the best part was just gathering around the table and gabbing!Just talking to other folks is, like, a posh tasting menu for the soul, you know?
Ohmigosh. That Turkey Day was the absolute BEST. Everything was so ultra nummy!Is it too early to start creating an inspo board for next year's menu?

OK, you know you can trust me when it comes to food, right? My palate is, like, très refined.Well, that food today in the plaza was le rich to the max, !Standing ovation to the chef! I'm happier than the audience at one of my shows!

MmmI can still, like, TASTE that delish feast in the air. What a fab Turkey Day!Every single dish in the plaza was worth a full feature on my vlog. I am going to be ultra busy!It's justhow can we get more food like that every day? Like, would Franklin open a food truck here?
